price: Say, “What do you think, if your water were to sink deep into the earth, who can bring you flowing water?”
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
